title: 14712 E. Poundstone Drive
posting_body: ['Text', 'show contact info', 'to setup a showing!', 'AREA: Aurora - Parker/Chambers Road', 'FEATURES:', 'This is a great, spacious townhouse located in the new and desirable Pioneer Hills subdivision!', 'Walking distance to many shops and restaurants, walking distance to Cherry Creek Park!', 'Walking distance to shops and restaurants at Parker and Chambers road!', 'HOA in charge of snow removal and lawn care in front yard.', 'Tenant is responsible for backyard.', 'INCLUDED UTILITIES:', 'Trash- HOA does not provide recycling.', 'TENANT PAID UTILITIES:', 'All utilities paid by tenant.', 'BEDROOMS & BATHROOMS: 2 bedrooms, 2.5 bathrooms and a loft upstairs.', 'KITCHEN APPLIANCES INCLUDED: Stove, refrigerator, dishwasher, microwave, disposal.', 'LAUNDRY: Laundry room with washer/dryer hookups.', 'FLOORING: Carpet/vinyl flooring.', 'HEAT/COOLING: Central heat and AC!', 'PARKING: 2 car attached garage!', 'FENCING: Fully fenced backyard!', 'BASEMENT:', 'Unfinished, 617 square feet.', 'PETS: Pets considered with a one-time non-refundable pet fee of $250 per pet.', 'Sorry, but we cannot allow any of the following breeds of dog: American Pit Bull Terrier, American Staffordshire Terrier, and Staffordshire Bull Terrier.', 'SECURITY DEPOSIT:', "Security deposit is equal to one month's rent.", 'APPLICATION FEE: $30 per adult.', 'AVAILABILITY DATE:', 'August 15th', "**Applicants must be able to start a lease within 2 weeks of the property's listed availability date.", '**', 'LEASE TERM: Initial lease to end April through June of 2023 with 12-month extensions possible at that time.', 'Growing marijuana inside or outside the premises is not allowed, smoking of any kind inside the property is not allowed.']
